mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBERTB(MID, MPASSWORD, MNAME, MPHONE, MADDR1, MADDR2, MADDR3, MPOINT, MEMAIL) VALUES(#{mid}, #{mpassword}, #{mname}, #{mphone}, #{maddr1}, #{maddr2}, #{maddr3}, 0, #{memail})
mapper.select: SELECT MID FROM MEMBERTB WHERE MID=#{mid}
SELECT MID FROM MEMBERTB WHERE MID=#{mid} AND MPASSWORD=#{mpassword}
SELECT*FROM MEMBERTB ORDER BY MID ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBERTB SET MPASSWORD=#{mpassword}, MPHONE=#{mphone} WHERE MID=#{mid}
UPDATE MEMBERTB SET MPOINT = MPOINT+#{mpoint} WHERE MID=#{mid}
